    Matheus Hostert

    Postdoctoral researcher at University of Minnesota and Perimeter Institute.

    mhostert AT umn.edu

    Publications

    You can find all my articles on INSPIRE.

    1. "A dark seesaw solution to low energy anomalies: MiniBooNE, the muon (g ensuremath- 2), and BaBar", Asli Abdullahi, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Phys. Lett. B, 2021, arXiv:2007.11813.

    2. "Novel multi-lepton signatures of dark sectors in light meson decays", Matheus Hostert, Maxim Pospelov, arXiv preprint, 2020, arXiv:2012.02142.

    3. "New opportunities at the next-generation neutrino experiments I: BSM neutrino physics and dark matter",C. Arguelles and others, Reports on Progress in Physics, 2020, arXiv:1907.08311.

    4. "Pair production of dark particles in meson decays", Matheus Hostert, Kunio Kaneta, Maxim Pospelov, PRD, 2020, arXiv:2005.07102.

    5. "Constraints on Decaying Sterile Neutrinos from Solar Antineutrinos", Matheus Hostert, Maxim Pospelov, arXiv preprint, 2020, arXiv:2008.11851.

    6. "Dark neutrinos and a three-portal connection to the standard model", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, PRD, 2020, arXiv:1903.07589.

    7. "Testing New Physics Explanations of the MiniBooNE Anomaly at Neutrino Scattering Experiments", Carlos Arguelles, Matheus Hostert, Yu-Dai Tsai, PRL, 2019, arXiv:1812.08768.

    8. "Neutrino Non-Standard Interactions: A Status Report",P. Bhupal Dev and others, arXiv preprint, 2019, arXiv:1907.00991.

    9. "Neutrino masses from a dark neutrino sector below the electroweak scale", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, PRD, 2019, arXiv:1903.07590.

    10. "Z-primes in neutrino scattering at DUNE", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Yuber Perez-Gonzalez, Zahra Tabrizi, Renata Zukanovich, Phys. Rev. D, 2019, arXiv:1902.08579.

    11. "Neutrino trident scattering at near detectors", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Yuber Perez-Gonzalez, Zahra Tabrizi, Renata Funchal, Journal of High Energy Physics, 2019, arXiv:1807.10973.

    12. "Light Sterile Neutrinos at nuSTORM: Decoherence and CP violation", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, arXiv preprint, 2017, arXiv:1705.09214.
